description: The Tuahine is the perfect all-day wear leather sandal . Featuring waterproof full - grain leather and stitching details inspired by the winds of Hawaii this style will take you from cruising the beach to dinner in town.
name: Olukai Tuahine - Mens

specs.value: Premium waterproof full- grain leather with a soft stretch mesh lining and a comfortable nylon toe post
Anatomical, compression molded, EVA midsole with a premium full- grain leather footbed cover
Non-marking 'Wet Grip Rubber' outsole with breeze block lug design for added grip
